name: Siminars
overview:
Siminars is a platform that turns content into an interactive experience. It’s how people and ideas connect.

Siminars keeps people interested in ideas by breaking content down into bite sized pieces, offering a fun user experience that rewards engagement, and a built-in social communiy that encourages involvement.

Siminars fills a void in the market of publishing and presentation tools. Existing tools are either too complex for mass adoption (think e-learning platforms) or too simple to be effectively in keeping someone interested and engaged as they explore new ideas (think Powerpoint)

The company has three different products:

Open Siminars are free to make, and free to take. They are ideal to help promote an idea, a product, a person, or a brand.

Retail Siminars are for premium ideas and allow content creators to productive their content. It’s a multimedia e-book broken down into bite sized pieces.

Private Siminars are designed to aid collaboration and/or training. Any company could unleash the power of Siminars to improve internal communication, transfer knowledge, and train employees, vendors, or customers.
